meta_description: Explore art classes for all ages, creative programs, and gallery exhibitions at the Holland Area Arts Council - an arts nonprofit organization building community through inclusive arts access.
admission_text:
### **BECOME A HOLLAND AREA ARTS COUNCIL ANNUAL MEMBER TODAY!**

**Included in your yearly Holland Area Arts Council Membership -**

**Priority Access**  
to events, artist calls, 10% class registration discount, and special event access at the Holland Area Arts Council. 

**NARM Membership  
** The North American Reciprocal Museum (NARM) Association® network is a mosaic of 1,470 art museums and galleries, historical museums and societies, botanical gardens, children’s museums, zoos, and more. When you sign up with your favorite participating NARM institution, you can receive reciprocal membership benefits across the United States, Bermuda, Canada, the Cayman Islands, Mexico, and Puerto Rico.

**Swag Items such as -**   
HAAC Stickers and  
Exclusive Collectors Pin

[ NARM Quarterly Publication ](https://viewer.joomag.com/narm-quarterly-summer-2025/0961999001749132844/p1?short=)

collections_text:
[ ](/exhibitions)

## Patricia Flynn Invitational VESSELS 

COMING SOON! Experience a exploration of three-dimensional art at the Patricia Flynn Invitational: VESSELS. A sculpture-focused exhibition that celebrates the diverse interpretations of the "vessel" as expressed through the varied mediums of its featured artists: Marti Lameti, David Huang, Don Zenas, Jami Mika, Pam Weston, Priscilla Lynch, and Susan Fleming.

Reception:  
Thursday, March 12th, 5:30 pm to 7:00 pm, joined with Theresa Gray’s reception.

Artwork from this exhibit will be available for purchase January 22nd - March 14th.

[ Learn More ](/exhibitions)

[ ](/exhibitions)

## EXHIBITIONS

We are honored to showcase three professional galleries: the Barbara H. Padnos Gallery, the Jane Armstrong Gallery, and the Lievense Zobkiw Gallery. Here we offer a range of exhibitions that highlight the work of local, regional, and emerging artists. Our galleries feature contemporary art, community-based projects, and multidisciplinary work that invites reflection, dialogue, and connection. Exhibitions change regularly, so there's always something new to experience.

[ Current Exhibitions ](/exhibitions)

[ ](/adult-classes)

## ADULT ART CLASSES

Our adult classes are open to everyone - whether you're picking up a pencil for the first time or expanding your practice as a working artist. Taught by a range of experienced instructors, including practicing artists and professional art educators, our courses are designed to ...
